Package org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes

Option panes for the tools in the inbuilt image editor.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArrowOptionPane This option pane displays options for drawing arrows - it separates the arrow head option and the line style option into two ThumbnailPanes.
BrightnessContrastOptionPane Provides an interface for the user to set the brightness and contrast of the current image or selection.
BucketFillOptionPane Provides an interface for the user to set the tolerance of the bucket fill tool.
CanvasSizeOptionPane A component used for setting the canvas size of the image editor.
EraserOptionPane This pane provides preset erasers to the user.
JMathTeXOptionPane Option pane for the JMathTeX tool in the image editor.
LineOptionPane Provides a GUI for setting line-style options.
PencilOptionPane Provides a selection of brushes on a ThumbnailPane for the user to choose from.
SelectionOptionPane This class provides the selection option to the user.
ShapeDrawOptionPane Displays all options for drawing shapes.
StampOptionPane This is essentially a clip-art library, with the user able to choose from different categories.
 

Package org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes Description

Option panes for the tools in the inbuilt image editor. Each option pane corresponds to a tool, and appears when the tool is made active.
